norms.text: I don't think that I did any major damage, just didn't want Enron to say that all volatility was and is the result of deregulation.

norms.text: I am waiting on a ruling from London's tax group and no trading will be done whatsoever until that point.

norms.text: Please provide an immediate response and copy the tax lawyers noted above.
norms.context: Request to respond promptly and involve relevant authorities
